fixes.name: Not Selected Date
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Data (Complaint Line)'[Type] <> SELECTEDVALUE('Date Type'[Display As]), 'Data (Complaint Line)'[Type])
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('Date Type'[Display As]) and converted row-level IF to DAX IF. Transformed column references to the 'Table'[Column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
